entry.title: Monday: Chance of showers. High 7. POP 40%
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending early this morning then cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers. Wind south 30 km/h becoming light near noon. High 7. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM PDT Monday 10 April 2023
